name: @dataunions/thegraph-subgraph
description: Subgraph definitions for sidechain data unions
author: Data Union DAO <contact@dataunions.org>

scripts.build: graph codegen subgraph.gnosis.production.yaml && graph codegen subgraph.development.yaml && graph build subgraph.development.yaml
scripts.build-production: graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml
scripts.docker:buildAndPushMultiArch: graph codegen subgraph.fastchain.yaml && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 . -t streamr/graph-deploy-dataunion-subgraph:dev-fastchain --push
scripts.deploy-fastchain: graph deploy streamr-dev/dataunion --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://streamr-dev-ipfs:5001 --node http://streamr-dev-thegraph-node-fastchain:8020 subgraph.fastchain.yaml
scripts.deploy-docker-dev: graph deploy streamr-dev/dataunion --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://streamr-dev-ipfs:5001 --node http://streamr-dev-thegraph-node:8020 subgraph.development.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy streamr-dev/dataunion --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8020 subgraph.development.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-fastchain: graph deploy streamr-dev/dataunion --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8820 subgraph.fastchain.yaml
scripts.deploy-production-gnosis: cp subgraph.gnosis.production.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run build-production && graph deploy dataunions/data-unions-gnosis
scripts.deploy-production-polygon: cp subgraph.polygon.production.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run build-production && graph deploy dataunions/data-unions-polygon
scripts.doAll: npm run build && npm run create-local && npm run deploy-local
scripts.doAll-inside-docker-dev: npm run build && npm run create-docker-dev && npm run deploy-docker-dev
